operations.detail: Record 20 times of one's own thoughts, feelings or goals every 30 days

operations.action: Install apps and follow social media accounts
operations.detail: Install 12 different types of applications and follow 15 different social media accounts
Enable privacy settings in the mobile phone

operations.action: Express objective views on social media
operations.detail: Express 20 objective and unbiased views on social media every 30 days

operations.action: Use shared calendar or task management app
operations.detail: Use shared calendar or task management application 20 times every 30 days

operations.action: Share creative works on social media

Use learning app continuously for 20 days within a month
